feed.title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!

entry.title: Implemented Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) Feature into Bitcoin Core!
entry.summary: The inquiry highlights the application of new signature algorithms and queries whether a new address type will be incorporated. It also questions the compatibility with the P2QRH BIP, noting that the selected algorithms align with those specified by the BIP. However, it points out that certain details remain ambiguous, suggesting a need for further clarification or elaboration on how these implementations will be integrated and utilized within the broader framework. The focus is on understanding the practical aspects of deploying these algorithms, including any potential changes to address formats and adherence to established Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs).
